moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4: The Main line against the old Philidor defense, not considered great for black.
moves.4. dxe5 dxe5: Normal for this line is 4..Nxe4?! 5. Qd5 Nc5 6. Bg5 Qd7 7. exd6 with a small advantage for white. Instead, this line immediately loses material.
moves.5. Qxd8+ Kxd8 6. Ng5: Slightly better than Nxe5, because now 6..Be6 is met with Nxe6, f3, Bc4, leaving black with horribly weak pawns.
moves.6... Rg8 7. Nxf7+ Ke7 8. Nxe5 Nxe4 9. Nd: Probably best is the immediate 10..Be6, but things aren't looking good for black.
moves.11. Bc4: Black's losing at least a rook. Unbelieveably, he's in a mating net.
moves.12... Kd6 13. O-O-O+ Kxe5 14. g4: Cutting off the last retreating square - f5
